Name: Base Station License Metro Luxury, Inc. Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Metro Luxury Inc., submitted as Metro Luxury, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Metro Luxury Inc., submitted as Metro Luxury, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 625 East 137th Street in the borough of The Bronx is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#758
07/23/98
